為上.definition: to be valued above all else

為主.definition: to rely mainly on; to attach most importance to

為了.definition: for; for the purpose of; in order to

為五斗米折腰.pinyin: wei4 wu3 dou3 mi3 zhe2 yao1
為五斗米折腰.definition: (allusion to Tao Qian 陶潛|陶潜[Tao2 Qian2], who used this phrase when he resigned from government service rather than show subservience to a visiting inspector) to bow and scrape for five pecks of rice (that being a part of his salary as a local magistrate); (fig.) to compromise one's principles for the sake of a salary

為人師表.definition: to serve as a model for others (idiom); to be a worthy teacher

為人民服務.definition: Serve the People!, CCP political slogan

為伍.definition: to associate with; to keep company with

為例.definition: used in the construction 以...為例|以...为例, "to take ... as an example"

為啥.definition: dialectal equivalent of 為什麼|为什么[wei4 shen2 me5]

為善最樂.definition: doing good deeds brings the greatest joy (idiom)

為夫.definition: (archaic) term used by a husband to refer to himself when speaking to his wife

為富不仁，為仁不富.pinyin: wei2 fu4 - bu4 ren2 , wei2 ren2 - bu4 fu4
為富不仁，為仁不富.definition: (idiom, from Mencius) the rich are not benevolent, and the benevolent are not rich

為己任.definition: to make it one's business; to take upon oneself to

為師.definition: term used by a teacher or master to refer to themself when speaking to their student

為德不卒.definition: to start on virtue but give up (idiom); to fail to carry things through; lack of sticking power; short attention span

為德不終.definition: to start on virtue but give up (idiom); to fail to carry things through; lack of sticking power; short attention span

為數.definition: in numerical terms (typically followed by 不少[bu4 shao3] or 不多[bu4 duo1] or a number)

為期.definition: (to be done) by (a certain date); lasting (a certain time)

為止.definition: until; (used in combination with words like 到[dao4] or 至[zhi4] in constructs of the form 到...為止|到...为止)

為此.definition: for this reason; with regards to this; in this respect; in order to do this; to this end

為民除害.definition: (idiom) to rid the people of a scourge

為準.definition: to serve as the norm; ...shall prevail (as standard for rules, regulations, price etc)

為父.definition: term used by a father to refer to himself when speaking to his child

為的是.definition: for the sake of; for the purpose of

為著.definition: in order to; because of; for the sake of

為虎作倀.definition: (idiom) to act as accomplice to the tiger; to help a villain do evil

為難.definition: to feel embarrassed or awkward; to make things difficult (for someone); to find things difficult (to do or manage)

為非作歹.definition: to break the law and commit crimes (idiom); malefactor; evildoer; to perpetrate outrages
